title: Multiplayer Drum Kit
description: Introducing the ultimate multiplayer drum kit package for Unreal Engine! Bring your game to life with the power of rhythm and create an immersive musical experience for players to collaborate and perform together in real-time.
longDescription:
Showcase Video || Demo || Documentation || Support Discord



Introducing the ultimate multiplayer drum kit blueprint package for Unreal Engine!


Introducing the ultimate multiplayer drum kit package for Unreal Engine! Bring your game to life with the power of rhythm and create an immersive musical experience for players to collaborate and perform together in real-time.

With intuitive controls and seamless integration, your players can easily join in and play alongside others from anywhere in the world.


Whether you're creating a music education game, a virtual concert experience, or just want to add a fun new feature to your game, our multiplayer drum kit blueprint package is the perfect solution. Start building your musical masterpiece today!


Leave a review to gain access to the giveaway channel in the Support Discord!





Why choose Multiplayer Drum Kit?


Our multiplayer drum kit package for Unreal Engine provides a unique and engaging feature for game developers to incorporate into their projects. With this package, you can easily create a collaborative and interactive musical experience that will keep your players engaged and entertained for hours.


Whether you're designing a music education game, a virtual concert experience, or just want to add a fun new feature to your game, our multiplayer drum kit blueprint package provides all the essential features you need to get started.


With customizable sound effects, networking and synchronization tools, and seamless integration with your existing Unreal Engine project, you can create a drum kit that will keep your players engaged and entertained for hours.


Don't miss out on this opportunity to take your game to the next level with our multiplayer drum kit blueprint package. Start building your musical masterpiece today!







What is this pack?💻

This pack features a game ready multiplayer drum kit, with sound effects included!

  • Drum kit mesh (Each tom is a separate mesh
  • Drum kit blueprint
  • Drum parts blueprints
  • Fully replicated
  • Game ready
  • Easy to set up
  • High quality drum sounds!







Where can I find more?📣


  • -My YouTube-
  • -My Product Page-
  • -My Website-










Got any questions?💭

Feel free to send me an email, or just ask your question in the question section of this page!

Or join the Support Discord!


Thank you for considering my pack!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Drum kit mesh (Each tom is a separate mesh)
  • Drum kit blueprint
  • Drum parts blueprints
  • Fully replicated
  • Game ready
  • Easy to set up
  • High quality drum sounds!

Number of Blueprints: 10

Input: Keyboard

Network Replicated: Yes

LODs: No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: Click here for the documentation.

Important/Additional Notes: All sound effects are CC0 and do not need further attribution. Sounds were obtained through cakewalk by bandlab.
